scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a centaur, a mythical creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse, in the act of shooting an arrow from a bow. The centaur has a white horse body and a human torso clad in a blue tunic and a white headdress. It is positioned against a red background adorned with golden floral motifs. The lower part of the scene shows a green grassy field with stylized plants. The centaur is depicted in profile, drawing the bowstring back, aiming its arrow forward. This imagery is likely a representation of the zodiac sign Sagittarius.
